summary: Iteration 80: Table Consistency + Mobile-First + i18n Rollout - ALL TESTS PASSED. Verified: (1) Language Selector visible in admin header with EN/ES/ZH options, (2) WalletModule tabs translate correctly in all 3 languages, (3) Bank Alerts tab correctly REMOVED from Wallet, (4) Wallet Overview has pagination (1-23 of 23), (5) Public Catalog has bulk select checkboxes, (6) Schools Management has search input, (7) Student Requests has pagination (1-20 of 20), (8) Private Catalog (Inventory) has pagination with 17 items, (9) Orders tab has search/filter functionality.
passed_tests: Language Selector visible in admin header (data-testid='language-selector')
Language Selector has 3 options: EN, ES, ZH (data-testid='lang-en', 'lang-es', 'lang-zh')
Wallet Module - i18n tabs translate correctly: ES (Resumen, Transacciones, Info Bancaria, Configuración), EN (Overview, Transactions, Bank Info, Settings), ZH (概览, 交易记录, 银行信息, 设置)
Wallet Module - Bank Alerts tab correctly REMOVED (only 4 tabs)
Wallet Overview - Pagination present (1-23 of 23, page size 25)
Public Catalog (Unatienda) - Bulk select checkboxes present (3 found)
Public Catalog - Search products input present
Schools Management (Users > Escuelas) - Search input present (data-testid='search-schools')
Student Requests (Users > Solicitudes Vinculación) - Pagination present (1-20 of 20)
Private Catalog (Unatienda > Inventory) - Shows 17 items with TablePagination
Private Catalog - Has All/PCA Textbooks/Public Store/Archived filter tabs
Orders Module - Bulk select checkboxes visible
critical_code_review_comments: WalletModule.jsx: Properly uses useTranslation hook for i18n with t('wallet.overview'), t('wallet.transactions'), etc.
AdminDashboard.jsx: LanguageSelector component correctly imported and placed in header next to theme toggle
LanguageSelector.jsx: Well-implemented with data-testid attributes for automated testing
PublicCatalogTab.jsx: Uses useTableSelection hook and TablePagination component for bulk operations
SchoolsManagementTab.jsx: Search input with data-testid='search-schools' for school filtering
StudentRequestsTab.jsx: Uses usePagination hook and TablePagination component
PrivateCatalogTab.jsx: Uses usePagination hook with 50 items per page default
TablePagination component correctly hides when totalItems <= first pageSize option
seed_data_creation: No new seed data. Used existing data for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 80 validated i18n rollout and table consistency features. Key validations: (1) LanguageSelector in admin header works with EN/ES/ZH, (2) WalletModule tabs translate correctly, (3) Bank Alerts tab removed, (4) All remaining admin tables have search/pagination/bulk-select as required. TablePagination component hides when data count is <= first page size option (10). Public Catalog only has 2 products so pagination is hidden. Orders module has 10 items so pagination is at threshold. Private Catalog (Inventory) shows pagination with 17 items.
